description.english: Complete your first level.
description.french: Terminez votre premier niveau.
description.spanish: Completa tu primer nivel.
description.schinese: 完成你的第一个关卡。
description.russian: Завершите свой первый уровень.
description.brazilian: Conclua seu primeiro nível.

description.english: Complete all tutorial levels.
description.french: Terminez tous les niveaux du didacticiel.
description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles del tutorial.
description.schinese: 完成所有教程关卡。
description.russian: Пройдите все обучающие уровни.
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os níveis do tutorial.

description.english: Earn 3 stars on 10 different levels.
description.french: Obtenez 3 étoiles dans 10 niveaux différents.
description.spanish: Consigue 3 estrellas en 10 niveles diferentes.
description.schinese: 在10个不同关卡中获得3星评级。
description.russian: Получите 3 звезды на 10 разных уровнях.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 3 estrelas em 10 níveis diferentes.

description.english: Earn 5 stars on 25 different levels.
description.french: Obtenez 5 étoiles dans 25 niveaux différents.
description.spanish: Consigue 5 estrellas en 25 niveles diferentes.
description.schinese: 在25个不同关卡中获得5星评级。
description.russian: Получите 5 звезд на 25 разных уровнях.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 5 estrelas em 25 níveis diferentes.

description.english: Accumulate 100 stars in total.
description.french: Accumulez un total de 100 étoiles.
description.spanish: Acumula un total de 100 estrellas.
description.schinese: 累计获得100颗星星。
description.russian: Накопите 100 звёзд.
description.brazilian: Acumule um total de 100 estrelas.

description.english: Accumulate 250 stars in total.
description.french: Accumulez un total de 250 étoiles.
description.spanish: Acumula un total de 250 estrellas.
description.schinese: 累计获得250颗星星。
description.russian: Накопите 250 звёзд.
description.brazilian: Acumule um total de 250 estrelas.

description.english: Complete the first world.
description.french: Terminez le premier monde.
description.spanish: Completa el primer mundo.
description.schinese: 完成第一个世界。
description.russian: Завершите первый мир.
description.brazilian: Conclua o primeiro mundo.

description.english: Complete the full campaign.
description.french: Terminez toute la campagne.
description.spanish: Completa toda la campaña.
description.schinese: 完成整个战役模式。
description.russian: Завершите всю кампанию.
description.brazilian: Conclua toda a campanha.

description.english: Get 5 stars in all campaign levels.
description.french: Obtenez 5 étoiles dans tous les niveaux de la campagne.
description.spanish: Consigue 5 estrellas en todos los niveles de la campaña.
description.schinese: 在所有战役关卡中获得5星评级。
description.russian: Получите 5 звёзд на всех уровнях кампании.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 5 estrelas em todos os níveis da campanha.

description.english: Create a multi-output filtering system with at least 3 different filters.
description.german: Erstelle ein Filtersystem mit mindestens 3 verschiedenen Ausgängen.
description.french: Créez un système de filtrage avec 3 filtres différents.
description.spanish: Crea un sistema de filtros con al menos 3 salidas diferentes.
description.schinese: 创建一个包含至少3个不同过滤器的多输出系统。
description.russian: Создайте систему с фильтрацией на 3 выхода.
description.brazilian: Crie um sistema com pelo menos 3 filtros diferentes.

description.english: Beat a level using only 50% of the allowed resources.
description.german: Schließe ein Level ab und nutze dabei nur 50% der erlaubten Ressourcen.
description.french: Terminez un niveau avec 50% des ressources autorisées.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel usando solo el 50% de los recursos permitidos.
description.schinese: 使用不超过50%的资源完成一个关卡。
description.russian: Пройдите уровень, используя только 50% разрешённых ресурсов.
description.brazilian: Conclua um nível usando apenas 50% dos recursos permitidos.

description.english: Finish any level under 30 seconds.
description.german: Beende ein beliebiges Level in unter 30 Sekunden.
description.french: Terminez un niveau en moins de 30 secondes.
description.spanish: Termina cualquier nivel en menos de 30 segundos.
description.schinese: 在30秒内完成任意关卡。
description.russian: Завершите любой уровень менее чем за 30 секунд.
description.brazilian: Conclua qualquer nível em menos de 30 segundos.

description.english: Make it into the Top 100 in any leaderboard.
description.german: Erreiche die Top 100 in einer Bestenliste.
description.french: Atteignez le top 100 d’un classement.
description.spanish: Entra en el Top 100 de cualquier clasificación.
description.schinese: 进入任意排行榜的前100名。
description.russian: Попадите в топ-100 любого рейтинга.
description.brazilian: Fique entre os 100 melhores em qualquer ranking.

description.english: Upload a Pro solution.
description.french: Publiez une solution Pro.
description.spanish: Publica una solución Pro.
description.schinese: 上传一个职业解法。
description.russian: Загрузите профессиональное решение.
description.brazilian: Envie uma solução Pro.

description.english: Be on Top 10 in a level (Pro Mode).
description.german: Erreiche die Top 10 in einem Level (Pro-Modus).
description.french: Top 10 d’un niveau en mode Pro.
description.spanish: Estar en el Top 10 en un nivel (modo Pro).
description.schinese: 在一个关卡（职业模式）中进入前10。
description.russian: Попадите в топ-10 уровня в режиме Профи.
description.brazilian: Fique entre os 10 melhores em um nível (Modo Pro).

description.english: Be on Top 10 in a level (Normal Mode).
description.german: Erreiche die Top 10 in einem Level (Normalmodus).
description.french: Top 10 d’un niveau en mode normal.
description.spanish: Estar en el Top 10 en un nivel (modo Normal).
description.schinese: 在一个关卡（普通模式）中进入前10。
description.russian: Попадите в топ-10 уровня в обычном режиме.
description.brazilian: Fique entre os 10 melhores em um nível (Modo Normal).

description.english: Earn 5 stars in all Tropical levels.
description.german: Erhalte 5 Sterne in allen tropischen Levels.
description.french: 5 étoiles dans tous les niveaux tropicaux.
description.spanish: Consigue 5 estrellas en todos los niveles tropicales.
description.schinese: 在所有热带关卡中获得5星评级。
description.russian: Получите 5 звёзд на всех тропических уровнях.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 5 estrelas em todos os níveis do mundo Tropical.

description.english: Participate in 5 Fortnightly Challenges.
description.french: Participez à 5 défis bimensuels.
description.spanish: Participa en 5 desafíos quincenales.
description.schinese: 参与5个双周挑战。
description.russian: Примите участие в 5 двухнедельных испытаниях.
description.brazilian: Participe de 5 desafios quinzenais.

description.english: Participate in 15 Fortnightly Challenges.
description.french: Participez à 15 défis bimensuels.
description.spanish: Participa en 15 desafíos quincenales.
description.schinese: 参与15个双周挑战。
description.russian: Примите участие в 15 двухнедельных испытаниях.
description.brazilian: Participe de 15 desafios quinzenais.

description.english: Have a top 100 solution in all 3 metrics.
description.german: Habe eine Top-100-Lösung in allen 3 Metriken.
description.french: Top 100 dans les 3 métriques.
description.spanish: Estar en el Top 100 en las 3 métricas.
description.schinese: 在所有3项指标中均进入前100名。
description.russian: Попадите в топ-100 по всем 3 метрикам.
description.brazilian: Tenha uma solução entre as 100 melhores em todas as 3 métricas.

description.english: Earn 5 stars in all Meadow levels.
description.french: 5 étoiles dans tous les niveaux de Prairie.
description.spanish: Consigue 5 estrellas en todos los niveles del Prado.
description.schinese: 在所有草原关卡中获得5星评级。
description.russian: Получите 5 звёзд на всех уровнях Лугов.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 5 estrelas em todos os níveis do mundo Prado.

description.english: Publish your first custom level.
description.french: Publiez votre premier niveau personnalisé.
description.spanish: Publica tu primer nivel personalizado.
description.schinese: 发布你的第一个自定义关卡。
description.russian: Опубликуйте свой первый пользовательский уровень.
description.brazilian: Publique seu primeiro nível personalizado.

description.english: Publish 10 levels.
description.french: Publiez 10 niveaux.
description.spanish: Publica 10 niveles.
description.schinese: 发布10个关卡。
description.russian: Опубликуйте 10 уровней.
description.brazilian: Publique 10 níveis.

description.english: Publish 25 levels.
description.french: Publiez 25 niveaux.
description.spanish: Publica 25 niveles.
description.schinese: 发布25个关卡。
description.russian: Опубликуйте 25 уровней.
description.brazilian: Publique 25 níveis.

description.english: Upload your first gallery image.
description.french: Téléversez votre première image de galerie.
description.spanish: Sube tu primera imagen a la galería.
description.schinese: 上传你的第一张画廊图片。
description.russian: Загрузите своё первое изображение в галерею.
description.brazilian: Envie sua primeira imagem para a galeria.

description.english: Earn 5 stars in all Desert levels.
description.french: 5 étoiles dans tous les niveaux désertiques.
description.spanish: Consigue 5 estrellas en todos los niveles del Desierto.
description.schinese: 在所有沙漠关卡中获得5星评级。
description.russian: Получите 5 звёзд на всех пустынных уровнях.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 5 estrelas em todos os níveis do mundo Deserto.

displayName.schinese: 完美主义者 - 魔法森林

description.english: Earn 5 stars in all Magical Forest levels.
description.german: Erhalte 5 Sterne in allen Levels des magischen Waldes.
description.french: 5 étoiles dans tous les niveaux de la Forêt Magique.
description.spanish: Consigue 5 estrellas en todos los niveles del Bosque Mágico.
description.schinese: 在所有魔法森林关卡中获得5星评级。
description.russian: Получите 5 звёзд на всех уровнях Волшебного леса.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 5 estrelas em todos os níveis da Floresta Mágica.

displayName.schinese: 完美主义者 - 阿尔卑斯

description.english: Earn 5 stars in all Alpine Mountains levels.
description.german: Erhalte 5 Sterne in allen Levels der Alpenregion.
description.french: 5 étoiles dans tous les niveaux alpins.
description.spanish: Consigue 5 estrellas en todos los niveles de los Alpes.
description.schinese: 在所有阿尔卑斯山关卡中获得5星评级。
description.russian: Получите 5 звёзд на всех уровнях Альп.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 5 estrelas em todos os níveis dos Alpes.

description.english: Complete a level using an inverted elevator.
description.german: Schließe ein Level mit einem invertierten Aufzug ab.
description.french: Terminez un niveau en utilisant un ascenseur inversé.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel usando un ascensor invertido.
description.schinese: 使用倒置电梯完成一个关卡。
description.russian: Пройдите уровень, используя перевёрнутый лифт.
description.brazilian: Conclua um nível usando um elevador invertido.

description.english: Use a Quantum Transporter for items or fluids.
description.german: Verwende einen Quantentransporter für Items oder Flüssigkeiten.
description.french: Utilisez un Transporteur Quantique pour des objets ou fluides.
description.spanish: Utiliza un Transportador Cuántico para objetos o fluidos.
description.schinese: 使用量子传送器传送物品或液体。
description.russian: Используйте квантовый транспортер для предметов или жидкостей.
description.brazilian: Use um Transportador Quântico para itens ou líquidos.

description.english: Use a splitter to filter 3 items from a single quantum output.
description.german: Nutze einen Verteiler, um 3 Items aus einem Quantum-Ausgang zu filtern.
description.french: Utilisez un répartiteur pour filtrer 3 objets d'une sortie quantique.
description.spanish: Usa un divisor para filtrar 3 objetos desde una salida cuántica.
description.schinese: 使用分流器从一个量子输出中分离出3种物品。
description.russian: Используйте делитель для фильтрации 3 предметов из одного квантового выхода.
description.brazilian: Use um divisor para filtrar 3 itens de uma saída quântica.

description.english: Complete a level using at least one Ultra Conveyor Belt.
description.german: Schließe ein Level mit mindestens einem Ultra-Förderband ab.
description.french: Terminez un niveau avec au moins un convoyeur ultra.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel usando al menos una cinta transportadora ultra.
description.schinese: 使用至少一个超速传送带完成一个关卡。
description.russian: Используйте хотя бы один ультра-конвейер для завершения уровня.
description.brazilian: Use pelo menos uma esteira ultra para concluir um nível.

description.english: Use an Ultra Elevator to deliver resources across 3+ vertical levels.
description.german: Nutze einen Ultra-Aufzug, um Ressourcen über 3+ vertikale Ebenen zu transportieren.
description.french: Utilisez un ascenseur ultra pour livrer sur 3 niveaux ou plus.
description.spanish: Usa un ascensor ultra para transportar recursos por más de 3 niveles verticales.
description.schinese: 使用超速电梯将资源传送跨越3个以上垂直层。
description.russian: Перенесите ресурсы на 3+ вертикальных уровня с помощью ультра-лифта.
description.brazilian: Use um elevador ultra para transportar recursos por 3 ou mais níveis verticais.

description.english: Complete a level using alternative recipes only.
description.german: Schließe ein Level nur mit alternativen Rezepten ab.
description.french: Terminez un niveau en n'utilisant que des recettes alternatives.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel usando solo recetas alternativas.
description.schinese: 仅使用替代配方完成一个关卡。
description.russian: Завершите уровень, используя только альтернативные рецепты.
description.brazilian: Conclua um nível usando apenas receitas alternativas.

description.english: Complete a level that contains Variable Rate Spawner.
description.german: Schließe ein Level mit einem variablen Spawner ab.
description.french: Terminez un niveau avec un Générateur à débit variable.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel con un Generador de Tasa Variable.
description.schinese: 完成一个包含可变速率生成器的关卡。
description.russian: Завершите уровень с генератором переменной скорости.
description.brazilian: Conclua um nível com um Gerador de Taxa Variável.

description.english: Complete a level that contains Variable Rate Spawner without using Storage.
description.german: Schließe ein Level mit variablem Spawner ab, ohne Lagerung zu nutzen.
description.french: Terminez un niveau avec un Générateur à débit variable sans stockage.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel con Generador de Tasa Variable sin usar almacenamiento.
description.schinese: 在不使用存储的情况下完成一个包含可变速率生成器的关卡。
description.russian: Завершите уровень с переменным генератором без использования хранилища.
description.brazilian: Conclua um nível com Gerador de Taxa Variável sem usar Armazenamento.

description.english: Play Automate It for 1 hour.
description.french: Jouez à Automate It pendant 1 heure.
description.spanish: Juega Automate It durante 1 hora.
description.schinese: 游玩《Automate It》1小时。
description.russian: Играть в Automate It в течение 1 часа.
description.brazilian: Jogue Automate It por 1 hora.

description.english: Play for 10 hours total.
description.french: Jouez un total de 10 heures.
description.spanish: Juega un total de 10 horas.
description.schinese: 总计游玩10小时。
description.russian: Общая продолжительность игры: 10 часов.
description.brazilian: Jogue por 10 horas no total.

description.english: Play for 50 hours total.
description.french: Jouez un total de 50 heures.
description.spanish: Juega un total de 50 horas.
description.schinese: 总计游玩50小时。
description.russian: Общая продолжительность игры: 50 часов.
description.brazilian: Jogue por 50 horas no total.

description.english: Complete any level in the Tropical world using 10 machines or fewer.
description.german: Schließe ein beliebiges tropisches Level mit 10 oder weniger Maschinen ab.
description.french: Terminez un niveau tropical avec 10 machines ou moins.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel tropical usando 10 máquinas o menos.
description.schinese: 在热带世界中仅使用10台机器或更少完成一个关卡。
description.russian: Завершите уровень в Тропиках, используя не более 10 машин.
description.brazilian: Conclua qualquer nível no mundo Tropical usando 10 máquinas ou menos.
